summary: This is an NPC overhaul of just about every female character in Riverwood. All females have female walk animations, not to mention they're a little bit prettier.
descriptionHtml:
[center]﻿[/center][center]﻿[color=#ff00ff][size=6]Ladies of Riverwood

[/size][/color]
[color=#ff00ff][size=6]
[/size][/color][/center][center]I've grown tired of making followers but love playing around in racemenu "what a great utility".
So I decided to do a character overhaul of just about every female character in Skyrim.
I'm gonna be releasing them by towns and some where along the way will release an all in one version.[/center]


[center]﻿A Big [color=#ff0000][size=6]Thank You

[/size][/color]To all those who share resources to allow me to do what I do

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/]KS Hairdos - Renewal

[/url]﻿[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75915/]KS Hairdos - Renewal Breast Weight Painted Hair

[/url]﻿[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/]The Eyes Of Beauty

[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/]Brows

[/url]﻿[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20343/]RANs Eye Reflection Extender

[/url]﻿[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7127]RANs HeadMesh Variants

[/url]﻿[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/]RaceMenu
